channel.title: London Evening Standard | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/eveningstandard

item.title: The city’s efforts to combat a
item.description: The city’s efforts to combat air pollution and boost ‘active travel’ have been applauded in a new global ‘heartbeat index’

item.title: The 65-year-old said there is
item.description: The 65-year-old said there is a possibility that she will lose her hair again

item.title: A fire at a high rise building
item.description: A fire at a high rise building destroyed part of a flat and an entire balcony
